item.title: About Me
item.author: bijil.subhash@gmail.com (Bijil Subhash)
item.description: Hello, I’m Bijil ðŸ‘‹ I am a data engineer who specialise in building robust and scalable data products, empowering businesses to generate value from their data. Few years ago, after finishing my doctorate in chemical engineering, my passion for data and engineering has led me to starting my career as a data scientist which later evolved into data engineering. My Expertise My key area of focus is on building reliable modern data infrastructure, encompassing data ingestion, data modelling, data visualisation, and data governance.
